content: halloween is just around the corner if you re looking for some last minute projects this tiny pumpkin is perfect for you these pumpkins are really quick to make and require minimum yarn the finished item is very tiny can easily fit 3 of these in my palm and most importantly it s a no-sew project it can also be a fall harvest pumpkin so brighten your fall season with a whole bunch tiny pumpkins now i hope you ll love and enjoy making these cute little pumpkins~
